alert.note: Alert for Adams; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:15PM MDT until July 08 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... North central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 214 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Fort Lupton, or 18 miles south of Greeley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. Brief landspouts are also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lochbuie, Hudson, Keenesburg and Prospect Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
